title: Zach Braff to Return for Scrubs Reboot
description: J.D. will soon be back in Scrubs, as Zach Braff has signed his deal to appear in the upcoming revival of the medical comedy series, which ran for 8 seasons (7 on NBC, 1 on ABC) from 2001-2009. Deadline reports that a tricky part of the deal involved Braff wanting to shoot the series in […] Zach Braff to Return for Scrubs Reboot Liz Shannon Miller
author: Liz Shannon Miller
excerpt: J.D. will soon be back in Scrubs, as Zach Braff has signed his deal to appear in the upcoming revival of the medical comedy TV series.
text: J.D. will soon be back in Scrubs, as Zach Braff has signed his deal to appear in the upcoming revival of the medical comedy series, which ran for 8 seasons (7 on NBC, 1 on ABC) from 2001-2009. Deadline reports that a tricky part of the deal involved Braff wanting to shoot the series in Los Angeles, as opposed to Vancouver. No filming location has been set at this time as the show remains in development, but it’ll soon be time to find out who else from the original cast might return. Donald Faison feels like he’s next.
html:
J.D. will soon be back in Scrubs, as Zach Braff has signed his deal to appear in the upcoming revival of the medical comedy series, which ran for 8 seasons (7 on NBC, 1 on ABC) from 2001-2009.

Deadline reports that a tricky part of the deal involved Braff wanting to shoot the series in Los Angeles, as opposed to Vancouver. No filming location has been set at this time as the show remains in development, but it’ll soon be time to find out who else from the original cast might return. Donald Faison feels like he’s next.
